makes up the busiest shipping port along the Pacific Coast. South Bay is also the launching point for many ferries to
(LAX) is the best way to get in to the many cities of the South Bay.
The Vincent Thomas Bridge, connecting San Pedro with Terminal Island, was referenced in the Red Hot Chili Pepper's song "Under the Bridge". The bridge is in a really desolate, industrial area.

has Cabrillo Beach with the Grunion Run every year. San Pedro also has the Cabrillo Marine Aquarium, the Los Angeles Maritime Museum, and the San Pedro Bay Historical Society.

Wilmington, a district of Los Angeles that is home to the Banning House, former residence of the man who brought the L.A. Harbor to fruition, and the Drum Barracks, a Civil War era U.S. Army post.
Many clubs, bars,and lounges can be found in Hermosa and Manhattan Beach.
